definition: to reissue/(of a disease) to recur/(of a patient) to suffer a relapse
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.chinese: 出院後隨訪無疼痛再發。

sentences.english: Stroke patients were then followed prospectively to assess recurrent stroke and death.
sentences.chinese: 並前瞻性的隨訪卒中患者，評估再發卒中和死亡。

sentences.english: The first flood was useless. God doesn't want to start a second one.
sentences.chinese: 第一次大水沒有用，上帝不想再發第二次了。

sentences.english: Relapse hematoma was treated via the clearance of homolateral hematoma by craniotomy with bone flap.
sentences.chinese: 再發血腫多采用骨瓣開顱血腫清除的方法。
